name: subtree-main
description: subtree main repo for illustrate the relationship between main and sub

scripts.subtree:add: git subtree add -P deps git@github.com:joeljiezhu/subtree-source.git main --squash --message 'feat: add subtree-source main'
scripts.subtree:update:msg: git filter-repo --message-callback 'return re.sub(b"Squashed", b"feat: Squashed", message, count=1)' --refs HEAD...HEAD~1 --force
